name: real-time-chat
description: Real-time chat application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../edu-frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:edu: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd edu-frontend && npm run dev"
